name: Material Design supplemental kit*
description:
This UI sticker sheet is a library of Material Design components that I did not include in my Material Design web starter kit.


Do you find this useful? Support my work ➔


This is meant to include only components that are less commonly used.


I try to keep the layer structure as simple as I can while still using auto layout because I'm familiar with the overwhelming experience of using other complex UI kits.


All icons are from Material Icons Outline.


What's new

  • Fixed Chrome bar issues.
  • Added interactive tooltip variants.
  • Cleaned up layer names for easier swapping.


———

*This is a work in progress. Come back to check for improvements and updates.


Got feedback? Help me make this more useful for everyone by sending me messages via the Friends of Figma Slack workspace or Twitter DMs!
